channel.title: How to get out of mobile mode?
channel.description:
I always browse these forums on my iPod Touch. And whenever I go to the forums, it displays in mobile view. Well, I'm getting kind of sick of mobile display due to its lack of functionality. So I tried to get it out of mobile mode with no luck. I've looked at the bottom of the page, nothing. Can anyone tell me how to get it out of mobile view?
-Thanks.

item.title: How to get out of mobile mode?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:2, topic:438385”]Go to the homepage and in the top corner it says “classic”
click that.[/quote]
And if it’s not there, go down to the bottom of the page and click home, after it refreshes it should be in top left/right.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get out of mobile mode?
